person.content:

Sure, my apologies for the confusion earlier. Here are the entities that refer to "Person" in the given paragraph:

2. Non-believers

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the entities that refer to "Person" in the original paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Person":

| Person |
| --- |
| Party (Democratic Left Alliance) |
| Non-believers |
